reference.title: Digital publication options
reference.shortdesc: DToC provides different features to share and save your document for future use.

section.title: Export Document
section.p: DToC provides you with an URL to preserve a link of your curated document. The “Export” option is found under the settings menu option (upper right corner).

Once you have opened the settings menu choose the “Export” button. This opens another popup that contains the URL for your document. You can either click on the linked “URL” option, which opens a new browser window or copy and paste the URL.

section.title: XML Digital View
section.p: For XML documents only, you can click on the "XML" button located in the upper right corner. This will open a new browser window with a display of your document XML structure.
You can bookmark this page. If you try to print this version of your document, the XML structure will not be printed, just the text.

link.linktext: Overview of Dynamic Table of Context
link.desc: The Dynamic Table of Context (DToC) lets users reveal information about their text that is not necessarily discovered when reading, such as word frequencies. DToC also allows users to customize their document with annotations and adding tags.
The Table of Contents shows the section or chapter breakdown of your document. The ToC will expand to display the information selected from the left column.

link.linktext: Left column of Dynamic Table of Context
link.desc: This column allow users to search and browse the document by key terms, tags, and word frequency information.
